title: How astronomers study the universe. - 2nd ed.
brief_description: Provides a basic introduction to astronomy. Includes a visit to Kitt Peak National Observatory, interviews with astronomers and technicians and recent telescopic photography. Suitable for upper primary, lower and middle secondary levels.
